EmailTemplate.name: Sales Rep Transfer
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing Caryl Caskey, your new Univar Sales Specialist
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Goodbye,
I have been given a new role within Univar and will not be your salesperson any longer. It has been a pleasure servicing your account. I am putting you in great hands, so please be ensured that your chemical requirements will be handled as they have been in the past.
Sincerely,
Allison Johnson Sales Specialist Univar | SCR
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Hello!
I’m your new Sales Specialist. You have my assurance that you’ll continue to receive the same great service you’ve always received from Univar.
Allison has filled me in on your company’s operations. I have many years of sales experience serving customers in the South Central area. I am excited in this new role and am looking forward to servicing your chemical needs. Please be ensured that I am here to assist you with your chemical requirements.
In the coming weeks, I’d like to speak with you for a few minutes to learn more about your business and the ways Univar and I can assist you.
In the meantime, please contact me if there’s anything I can do for you. My number one priority is to help your business grow. Your success is my success.
Sincerely,
Caryl Caskey Sales Specialist Univar | SCR (713)589-6283 Caryl.Caskey@univarusa.com
This email was sent to {!Contact.Email} from Univar USA Inc. 17425 NE Union Hill Rd., Redmond, WA 98052
